t:type.name: AlexaEndpoint
t:type.t:description: Represents the Alexa V3 endpoint structure

t:attribute.name: endpointId
t:attribute.description: A device identifier. The identifier must be unique across all devices owned by an end user within the domain for the skill.

t:attribute.name: friendlyName
t:attribute.description: The name used by the customer to identify the device.

t:attribute.name: description
t:attribute.description: A human-readable description of the device.

t:attribute.name: manufacturerName
t:attribute.description: The name of the device manufacturer.

t:attribute.name: displayCategories
t:attribute.description: Indicates the group name where the device should display in the Alexa app.

t:attribute.name: cookie
t:attribute.description: String name/value pairs that provide additional information about a device for use by the skill adapter.

t:attribute.name: capabilities
t:attribute.description: An array of capability objects that represents actions particular device supports and can respond to.

t:attribute.name: online
t:attribute.description: True if the endpoint is online, false otherwise

t:attribute.name: model
t:attribute.description: The model name of the endpoint
